metadata.title: CVE-2020-13947 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An instance of a cross-site scripting vulnerability was identified to be present in the web based administration console on the message.jsp page of Apache ActiveMQ versions 5.15.12 through 5.16.0.

criterions.comment: activemq package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
